name: tron.io
description: A multiplayer browser implementation of the game tron including an AI computer player.

scripts.client-build: npm run client-build:js && npm run client-build:css
scripts.client-build:js: browserify src/site/assets/js/entry.js -o src/site/static/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t [ riotify ]
scripts.client-watch:js: watchify src/site/assets/js/entry.js -o src/site/static/js/main.js -dv -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t [ riotify ]

author: Braden Marshall
